description: I have been contracting for several clients mainly using AngularJS, Angular, @ngrx, TypeScript, React, JavaScript, Karma/Jasmine, Jest working on mobile device web UIs (Progressive Web Apps) and multiplatform Responsive Web Design on backend using PHP and JSP with data-bases: PouchDB and MongoDB. These have been the main roles I have fulfilled during this time, also combined with smaller freelance projects.
During the time I produced a predictive and future proof component-oriented WebApp with the highest attention to detail and striving for clean, simple, elegant and reusable code.

During the time I produced a robust combination of reusable Components that combine into a Client UI super reactive category SPA Web Application. These individual apps provide a cyber resilience for an email offering cloud security, archiving and continuity services. My task was to take care of the migration and development of new components used by the rest of the developers, automate tasks and create the structure that other developers will follow as well as assisting and mentoring less senior engineers of the team.

During my time at the MET I produced a responsive component-oriented SPA PWA Web App, this solution generates the UI and performs a communication channel between Police Command Centre and Patrol Units. Working with PouchDB handle by the tablets in sync with the command centre MongoDB database. Mentoring and providing guidance and mentoring to less senior engineers
Working to produce elegant solutions and creating new campaigns

Working to build a Responsive Web solution as a developer and Mobile Strategist role part of a multidisciplinary agile team developing multi-device web UX. Starting with the low fidelity paper sketchpad and ending up with a simple and great website. Using developer UX techniques to optimise accessibility for mobile and tablet using React

Successfully created a Responsive Web. working day to day responsive and cross-platform problems and mentoring junior developers, from Mobile First wireframes to final implementation. Liaising with the designers and mentoring about the latest trends, multi-device layouts, RWD, content-first strategy priorities

Successfully produced a Responsive Web developer solution working on an eXtreme programming set of values, principles, and practices for rapidly developing high-quality software that provides the highest value in the fastest possible way.

During my period in the BBC I was part of the HomePage Team. We successfully developed a Responsive Web Application, to generate the new Responsive website. Getting involved in real user testing and guerrilla usability testing and development process improving Mobile usability, UX and device optimisation.
During my time at Rumbo, I produced a new GUI and interactive search, improving the usability for commercial purposes.
Similar to google maps, I was involved in the Nokia development of the multiplatform map web solution.
Successfully produced a Mobile/Desktop Web developer role implementing GUI/UX for Mobile/Desktop for low/high-end devices.
Developing a desktop and hybrid iOS Web APP and websites using real-time push data for several clients.
